mapper.select: select * from mtom_bbs where member_id=#{member_id} order by qa_idx asc
mapper.insert: insert into mtom_bbs values( mtom_bbs_idx.nextval, #{member_id}, #{qa_subject}, #{qa_content}, null, 'n', sysdate, null )
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from (select * from mtom_bbs order by qa_idx desc)a)b where rnum>=#{startnum} and rnum<=#{endnum}
mapper.update: update mtom_bbs set qa_answer=#{qa_answer}, qa_checked='y', qa_adate=sysdate where qa_idx=#{qa_idx}
